biotools.summary:
A Pre- and Post-processing Toolbox for Histological Rodent Brain Section Images.

Nutil aims to both simplify and streamline the mechanism of pre-and-post processing 2D brain image data from mouse and rat.

Nutil simplifies and streamlines the pre-and-post processing of 2D brain image data from mouse and rat.
